Title: Exact Vengeance, Son Goku! The Countdown to the Planet's Collapse
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Despite the danger of Namek's impending implosion, Goku continues his battle with Frieza, determined to extract revenge for Krillin's murder. Elsewhere, Gohan tries to locate Bluma before it's too late!
